Summary: Phosphorescent blue chevron pattern, fast moving
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i always sit out in the backyard and watch the stars. we never thought we'd see what we saw tonight. it was so fast that we nearly missed it. she was sitting in the hammock and i was sitting a short distance from her in a lawn chair when we saw this quick burst of phosphorescent blue in a pattern that can be likened to a chevron but in boomerang formation. there was one blue arrow-like spot in the front. there were 4 others behind it slightly staggered, but equal distance apart. it was large and appeared in a faint cloud formation to the east of our home. in the blink of an eye, it had jumped quite a distance and just blinked in and out and was gone. it looked like it could have been the under lighting of a large craft, but being ex-military, i don't think we have technology that moves in the blink of an eye. my wife is especially sensitive to electromagnetic and static charges and she reported having tingling in her extremeties when the incident occurred. she says her hands are still tingling. we were actually preparing to come back into the house when it happened, but we braved the mosquitoes to see if it would reoccur. it did not. i've never seen anything move that fast. if we hadn't both seen it, i'd be wondering if it was an illusion of some type. strange stuff. she googled "phosphorescent blue lights in az sky" and that brought us here. we did noticed that other people from our area had reported a different type of incident on 9\11. we were totally unprepared for it so we do not have photos. we will be keeping the digital camera handy from this point forward.
